content: "What is that house?" Pinocchio asked a little boy near him. "Read the sign and you'll know." "I'd like to read, but somehow I can't today."
translations: ita:Cos'è quella casa﹖, chiese Pinocchio a un ragazzino vicino a lui. Leggi il cartello e lo saprai. Vorrei leggere, ma in q
